name: trillionth
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
1,000,000,000,000th written as a word: In July, the company's web engineers said they had registered the trillionth web page available via the search engine.informal He doesn't laugh when I miss the ball for the trillionth time (= I've already missed it a lot of times). See
trillion
More examplesFewer examplesWhat will the world look like by the time the trillionth baby arrives?This documentary must be about the trillionth to be screened starring the shark.I gave her my card and apologized for the nine trillionth time.

one of 1,000,000,000,000 equal parts of something: The new particles decay after only trillionths of a second. The samples are measured in trillionths of a gramme. See
trillion
More examplesFewer examplesThe currency was worth less than one trillionth of a US cent.I do not have a device which can actually measure my height to a trillionth of a metre.A bacterium weighs only about a trillionth of a gram.
